name: iconv_strrpos
purpose: Finds the last occurrence of a needle within a haystack

return.description:
Returns the numeric position of the last occurrence of
   needle in haystack.
   The characters are counted
   on the basis of the specified character set charset.If needle is not found,
   iconv_strrpos will return FALSE.This function may
return Boolean FALSE, but may also return a non-Boolean value which
evaluates to FALSE, such as 0 or
"". Please read the section on Booleans for more
information. Use the ===
operator for testing the return value of this
function.
